statements: SELECT title, author FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author='Jane Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING total_articles > 1 ORDER BY total_articles DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT title, SUBSTRING(content_body, 1, 100) AS short_content FROM articles WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(content_body) > 100 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM articles ORDER BY author;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT id, author, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE article_id=1;
SELECT commenter, comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE comment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter = 'Alice Smith' ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT articles.title, comments.comment_text FROM articles JOIN comments ON articles.id = comments.article_id WHERE articles.author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_comments FROM articles JOIN comments ON articles.id = comments.article_id GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT article_id, title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT article_id, title, author, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_id IN (SELECT author_id FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01');

SELECT article_id, title, publication_date, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM articles LEFT JOIN comments ON articles.article_id = comments.article_id GROUP BY article_id ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comments GROUP BY article_id HAVING comment_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT a.title, c.comment_text FROM articles a JOIN comments c ON a.id = c.article_id;
SELECT a.title, t.tag_name FROM articles a JOIN tags t ON a.id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'technology';
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE article_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT article_id, tag_name FROM article_tags INNER JOIN tags ON article_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id WHERE article_id = '12345'
SELECT author_name, COUNT(article_id) as article_count FROM authors LEFT JOIN articles ON authors.author_name = articles.author GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY article_count DESC
SELECT author, COUNT(comment_id) as comment_count FROM articles LEFT JOIN comments ON articles.id = comments.article_id GROUP BY author ORDER BY comment_count DESC
